content.answer: We strive to make your application process as smooth as possible for any positions at Turtlehead Tacos - whether that's at corporate or on one of the Restaurant Teams. It will start with a quick conversation with a Recruiting manager, followed by in-person interviews where possible, otherwise video interviews. We try to keep the process quick so it should take less than 3 weeks from start to finish.
content.name: What is the application process like?
content.question: What is the application process like?
